constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ISSA:
H.R. 7129.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Authority granted to Congress under Section 8, Article I of
the Constitution, the power to regulate commerce.
[Page H3828]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To prohibit the importation of crude oil from Iran.
